description: Periodic WorkManager tasks skipped or not running at expected intervals. Background sync unreliable.
commonCauses: Repeat interval less than minimum (15 minutes)
Device in Doze mode suppressing periodic work
App in battery optimization preventing background execution
Work taking longer than repeat interval
solutions: Use minimum 15-minute interval for periodic work
Configure flex interval appropriately: PeriodicWorkRequest.Builder(15, MINUTES, 5, MINUTES)
Request battery optimization exemption if critical
Use expedited work for important periodic tasks
Implement manual trigger option for users
Use foreground service for critical periodic work
prevention: Never use interval less than 15 minutes
Test on devices with aggressive battery management
Monitor periodic work execution in analytics
Document expected vs actual execution frequency
